text: John Edward Musker (born November 8, 1953) is an American animator, film director, film producer and screenwriter. == Life and career == Musker was born in Chicago, Illinois to Irish Catholic parents Robert J. Musker and Joan T. Lally. == Personal life == Musker is married to Gale. They had twin sons, Jackson and Patrick, and a daughter, Julia. == Other websites == * Category:1953 births Category:American animators Category:Annie Award winners Category:Artists from Chicago Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Chicago Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
title: John Musker
